title: Strengthening System Design Practical Competencies: Boredom Management Strategies in Second Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Within four weeks, learners can identify three or more situations that induce boredom in the second language learning process.
Over six weeks, learners can improve learning concentration by 20% by applying five or more metacognitive strategies to reduce boredom.
Learners can design and present a personalized learning plan applying boredom management strategies in the final project.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
